name: Gardevoir
evolution: Level 1 Ralts, Level 6 Kirlia, Level 10 Gardevoir

passive.name: Synchronize
passive.description: When an opponent inflicts decreased movement speed or a damage-over-time condition on the Pokemon, the same is inflicted on that opponent. This Ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

basic attack.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and decreases their Sp. Def for a short time. If this boosted attack hits only a single opposing Pokémon, the damage it deals is increased.

base.name: Confusion
base.description: Attacks straight in the designated direction.

upgrades.name: Psychic
upgrades.description: After hitting an opposing Pokemon or traveling its maximum distance, creates a circle that deals damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect, decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

upgrades.name: Moonblast
upgrades.description: Has the user attack while moving back to create distance. When this move's blast hits, it deals damage to opposing Pokemon in a cone and leaves the opposing Pokemon closest to the user unable to act for a short time.

base.name: Teleport
base.description: Has the user warp to the designated area, increasing the damage dealt by one basic attack after warping.

upgrade.description: Also increases the damage this move deals each time one of its attacks lands successfully.

upgrades.name: Psyshock
upgrades.description: Attacks three times in front of the user.

upgrade.description: Resets this move’s cooldown when the move lands successfully.

upgrades.name: Future Sight
upgrades.description: Sets a delayed explosion. When the explosion hits an opposing Pokemon, it shortens this move's cooldown.

unite.name: Fairy Singularity
unite.description: Warps space in the designated area, drawing in opposing Pokemon. {{Shoves|knockback}} and deals damage to opposing Pokemon the instant the warped space disappears.
